Pre-Game Insights: Phoenix Suns are on a six-game win streak as they prepare to face the Dallas Mavericks.
Dallas Mavericks finished last season with a 50-32 overall record and 31-21 in Western Conference play.
Phoenix Suns finished last season with a 49-33 overall record and 29-23 in Western Conference play.
Dallas Mavericks averaged 117.9 points per game while shooting 48.1% from the field and 36.9% from 3-point range last season.
Phoenix Suns averaged 27.0 assists per game on 42.5 made field goals last season.
Others: Injuries for the Mavericks include Dante Exum (out, wrist), Dereck Lively II (day to day, shoulder), P.J. Washington Jr. (out, knee), and Maxi Kleber (out, hamstring).
Injury for the Suns includes Bradley Beal (day to day, elbow).
